short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GPTCodeForge converts code blocks from ChatGPT into full blown editors, with syntax highlighting, autocompletion, and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GPT Code Forge allows a developer using chat gpt, to convert code blocks output from chat gpt into full blown code editors, simply by clicking on the code block.  You can activate the conversion via a single click, double click, or using the convert all button.  You can also convert code you pasted into chat gpt, by selecting the wrap pasted code check box, and selecting a default language.  The code is then wrapped with a comment that helps convert it to a code editor.  Use the same activation method to convert your pasted code, into editors.
